Subject: Major Incident Notification: Browsing Issue with External websites
--------------------------------------------------
    

 

Major Incident Notification: Browsing Issue with External websites

 ______________________________________________________________________________

 

Date: 20 Feb, 2025

Time: :07:02 AM GST

 

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that multiple users are unable to browse external websites in India and UAE.  Our Tech teams are engaged and investigating the issue.

 

If you require any assistance during this time frame, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> .

 

Alternatively, you can also reach out to us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or utilize the chatbot available on the support portal. 

 

Thanks,

Chalhoub Tech.

 

  

  If you have any questions, please reach out to the IT Service Desk via One reach Link <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/dashboard/default>
